thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com
thread.title: Chris Okeefe
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Chris Okeefe

author: Chris Okeefe
title: Chris Okeefe
text:
I had questions that I emailed and got answers right away.
I was able to get custom sized mats (I didn't want the standard size openings you find buying pre-cut mats), needed archival quality, and wanted a contrasting cut edge, all found on this site. Got the mats in perfect condition, well packed!
